short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support CryMor via various affiliate programs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This application was developed to allow fans of the CryMor YouTube community to easily and automatically add disclosed affiliate links to websites they visit. 

This application currently adds affiliate codes for Amazon (US), Epic Games, GreenManGaming, & Humble Bundle. GreenManGaming will redirect prior to going to main page through an affiliate tracking URL ("anrdoezrs.net/*").

Change Log:
1.1 Added GreenManGaming. Fixed Epic referral code. It might still not work.
1.2/3 Amazon (US) referral changes to comply with review.
